title: Data Processing History
description: A history record of processing that produced a given data file. For more information, see: https://wiki.earthdata.nasa.gov/display/TRT/In-File+Provenance+Metadata+-+TRT-42

date_time.description: The date and time at which the processing occurred. Note date-time format which is RFC3339, subset of ISO-8601

derived_from.description: List of source data files used in the creation of this data file

cf_history.description: The value of any CF :history attribute not addressed in :history_json records

program.description: The name of the program which generated this data file

version.description: The version identification of the program which generated this data file

parameters.description: The list of parameters to the program when generating this data file

program_ref.description: A URL reference that defines the program, e.g., a UMM-S reference URL
